summary: The module defines structured models for labeled data chunks and for a collection of search or recommendation results that have been reordered by relevance, incorporating validation logic. It also provides a helper to perform the reranking using an LLM service and includes an example entry point to execute the workflow.
business_intent: Showcase how to integrate a large language model to improve the relevance ordering of search or recommendation results, offering a reusable pattern for developers building ranking pipelines.
